description:
Reitei Lyon`s lackeys are attacking! They`re going to dump nuke`em jelly on the village to wipe it off the map! Natsu`s really mad and faces off against a wizard that can`t be affected by magic, Yuka "The Wave," and "Paralyze Claw" Tobi!! And Lucy`s in a real jam when her Celestial Spirit gets controlled by Doll Attack magic wielding Sherry! With Gray out of the battle, with the odds against them, with match ups giving the enemy an advantage... Can Fairy Tail win?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Natsu contre les ondes de Yuka
Natsu vs. Yuka the Wave User
